001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.util.Log;
005import android.view.LayoutInflater;
006import android.view.Menu;
007import android.view.View;
008import android.view.ViewGroup;
009import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
010import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
011import androidx.appcompat.widget.PopupMenu;
012import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
013import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
014import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.R;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.adapter.PassphrasesAdapter;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.databinding.FragmentPassphrasesBinding;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.model.Passphrase;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.viewmodel.PassphraseViewModel;
020import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
021
022
023public class PassphrasesFragment extends Fragment {
024
025  private FragmentPassphrasesBinding binding;
026  private PassphraseViewModel viewModel;
027
028  @Nullable
029  @org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable
030  @Override
031  public View onCreateView(@NonNull @NotNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable @org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable ViewGroup container,
032      @Nullable @org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
033    binding = FragmentPassphrasesBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
034    binding.refresh.setOnClickListener((v) -> viewModel.fetch());
035    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
036    binding.search.setOnClickListener((v) -> viewModel.search(binding.searchText.getText().toString()));
037    binding.create.setOnClickListener((v) -> openDialog(null));
038    // TODO: 11/2/23 Attach listeners.
039    return binding.getRoot();
040  }
041
042  @Override
043  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull @NotNull View view, @Nullable @org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
044    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
045    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity())
046        .get(PassphraseViewModel.class);
047    getLifecycle().addObserver(viewModel);
048    viewModel
049        .getPassphrases()
050        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (passphrases) -> {
051          binding.passphrases.setAdapter(new PassphrasesAdapter(requireContext(), passphrases,
052              (v, pos, passphrase) -> openDialog(passphrase.getKey()),
053              (v, pos, passphrase) -> showPopUpMenu(v, passphrase)));
054        });
055  }
056
057  private void openDialog(String key) {
058    Navigation.findNavController(binding.getRoot())
059        .navigate(PassphrasesFragmentDirections.openEditPassphraseFragment().setKey(key));
060  }
061
062  private void showPopUpMenu(View view, Passphrase passphrase){
063    PopupMenu popup = new PopupMenu(requireContext(), view);
064    Menu menu = popup.getMenu();
065    popup.getMenuInflater().inflate(R.menu.passphrase_actions, menu);
066    menu.findItem(R.id.edit_passphrase).setOnMenuItemClickListener((item) -> {
067      openDialog(passphrase.getKey());
068      return true;
069    });
070    menu.findItem(R.id.delete_passphrase).setOnMenuItemClickListener((item) -> {
071      // TODO: 11/7/23 Ask for user confirmation.
072      viewModel.delete(passphrase.getKey());
073      // TODO: 11/7/23 Modify passphraseViewModel to refresh automatically after successful creation, update or deletion.
074      return true;
075    });
076    popup.show();
077
078  }
079}
